channel.title: New release - Macro Scape by Jeff [562]
channel.description:
[b]Hey guy's im releasing my new scape.
Its called [u][i]Macro Scape[/i][/u]. Try it out
Here are some things that I have started so far:
-New JFrame -New Interfaces -Good Custom items -Fixed Mini-Map Glitch when you teleport. -New Magic icons -New Hit Icons -New Block Icons -New Hp Bars -Fixed Cache no more Helmets in the Fences -Added Cursors in the JFrame -New Rs Text -Custom Crowns -New Context Menus -Rune Scapes Hd Smog Sky Loading -And Much More to come
Now for the Pictures!
~New Updated Pic New 90% Lunar Interface [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/lunar.jpg[/img]
New Random Even Interface (Still in Progress) [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/random.jpg[/img]
New Kbd Warn Interface! [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/kbd-1.jpg[/img]
New Skill Cape Exchange Interface! [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/skillcapes.jpg[/img]
New Icons and Tabs!! [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/icons.jpg[/img]
Pest Control In-Game Interface [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/pestingame.jpg[/img]
New God Wars Kill Count Interface! [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/godwars.jpg[/img]
New Magic Sorting Interface: [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/magebook.jpg[/img]
New Dungeon Icons/and Flag icons [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/newflag.jpg[/img]
New Assault Interface [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/assault.jpg[/img]
New Pest Control Reward Interface [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/pest.jpg[/img]
New Hit Icons/Block Icons and New Hp Bars [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/hpbars.jpg[/img]
New Right Click Context Menus [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/contex.jpg[/img]
New Normal Magic/Ancient Magic Hovering Black Boxes [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/magic1.jpg[/img]
New Option Tab [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/option.jpg[/img]
New Emote Tab (The Scroll Bar Works) [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/emote.jpg[/img]
New Combat Boxes/Rs Hd Sky [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/combatboxes.jpg[/img]
New Skill Interface [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/newinterface.jpg[/img]
Finally the New Magic Icons (Still in Progress) [img]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss241/jeffey12345/magiciconsinprogress.jpg[/img]
Good luck checking it out :) Hope you like it.[/b]

item.title: New release - Macro Scape by Jeff [562]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Zivearia, post:4, topic:391348”]Shitty Leech, pictures aren’t even yours.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


then this is obviously a virus.

Im tired of these little kids who come in here thinking they are “Hackers” trying to steal rs accounts. Because thats what they do, someone does something really good they think they can do it again and they all repeatedly try without stopping, thinking they can do exactly what happened with powerbot, same with rsps, there are extremely successful servers and they want to do that too, with no effort, thinking everyone is fucking retarded and they will join their servers, same thing with noobs like these; except in this case its downloading, not playing a server.

Read full topic

[b]Hey guy’s im releasing my new scape.

Its called Macro Scape. Try it out

Here are some things that I have started so far:

-New JFrame

-Good Custom items
-Fixed Mini-Map Glitch when you teleport.
